EmailTemplate.description: Template to send RHC notification during RHC simulation
EmailTemplate.name: RHC Simulation 50_75
EmailTemplate.subject: IMPORTANT NOTIFICATION : Remittance Holding Capacity Monitoring status - {!Account.IATACode__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Agent,
We would like to inform you that according to our records you have reached {!ANG_RHC_Information__c.ANG_ConsumedRHC_Percent__c}% of your Remittance Holding Capacity (RHC).
It should be noted that your RHC amount is set at {!ANG_RHC_Information__c.ANG_RHC_Amount__c} and the currently used amount is {!ANG_RHC_Information__c.ANG_ConsumedRHC__c}.
At this time and until 01st March 2018, this message is for your information only – no action is required. However, please note that as of 01 March 2018, if your Agency’s total Cash amounts outstanding to the BSP reach 100% of your RHC, Cash as a form of payment will be temporarily restricted until a remittance is received, although, you will be able to continue issuing tickets through other forms of payment such as Credit Card (if applicable), IATA EasyPay and/or other alternative transfer methods.
For more information on Remittance Holding Capacity, please do not hesitate to contact us via the IATA Customer Portal.
Best Regards,
IATA – Global Delivery Center
